TopicTitle: Drunken Rocketry: Drinking and Raising Flags

Articles.Content:
So I took a few weeks off due to things like families, marriages and life but am back with .20.2 locked and loaded to (hopefully) continue my experiments with alcohol and rocket science. We'll see what we can do this time around but as always I would love to get on the mun, especially with the ability to plant flags. Hope to see you there!

Drunken Rocketry: Drinking and Raising Flags
